cast.original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
cast.overview: After years of being sheltered from the human world, the Turtle brothers set out to win the hearts of New Yorkers and be accepted as normal teenagers through heroic acts. Their new friend April O'Neil helps them take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.
cast.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem

cast.original_title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
cast.overview: Harley Quinn joins forces with a singer, an assassin and a police detective to help a young girl who had a hit placed on her after she stole a rare diamond from a crime lord.
cast.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)

details.biography: Derek Wilson is a television actor. He is featured in Rectify, the Preacher TV series and is a star of the Hulu original series Future Man, in which he plays the character Wolf.
details.name: Derek Wilson
